content: That's correct, Kira doesn't have power yet, but after Zeph's death, she acquires the resonance potential of his soul, which brings her from a level 2 to a level 4. The story follows Kira as she comes to terms with her brother's death, and also has to navigate the new powers and responsibilities that come with her new level of resonance. It also explores her struggles with guilt and grief, as well as her feelings of inadequacy and insecurity due to her lack of resonance potential before Zeph's death. As she embarks on the journey to find magical artifacts to seal the rifts between the realms, she must also come to terms with her newfound power and find her own place in the world.
